title: What Kind of Mom Will You Be?
description: Discover your natural motherhood style and how it creates magic (or chaos) in your parenting journey
targetProblem: Uncertainty about your parenting style and doubts about your natural motherhood instincts
resultBenefit: Custom strategies to leverage your natural motherhood gifts

types.name: The Nurturing Navigator Mom
types.description: You have the rare gift of creating emotional safety and connection

types.name: The Structured Stability Mom
types.description: You create the systems and routines that help families thrive

types.name: The Wisdom Cultivator Mom
types.description: You raise tiny philosophers who question and understand the world

types.name: The Adventure Catalyst Mom
types.description: You turn ordinary moments into magical adventures and memories

types.name: The Empowered Advocate Mom
types.description: You raise changemakers who stand up for themselves and others
